Cloud Native Edge Computing

What is Edge Computing?

Edge Computing has a broad range of definitions. The simple answer is anything outside the public cloud. Read our What is Edge Computing? article for the full discussion.

What is Oort?

We're an Edge Computing startup infected with Cloud Native philosophy.

Read more about Oort.

What's next?

Have a cool Edge Computing use case? Or just interested in learning more about Oort? We'd love to hear from you.

Contact us anytime.

Stay Tuned

Read our blog, tell us your story and sign up for our mailing list. Edge Computing is an exciting frontier for new ideas.
